response.overview: The musical film by director, actor, musician and choreographer Anton Adasinsky was created at the junction of cinema, music, theater and video art. This is a fairy tale-parable, where the theme of Dante's "Divine Comedy" is intertwined with reality. A fairy tale for children and adults. Only Children and Birds can get to the place where the World Clock broke. Taking the magic notes with them, they, having passed through all the adversities and obstacles, will find themselves at the goal. But is it necessary to fix the Running of Time? Maybe not to rush to grow up?
response.title: Ticket to the Divine Comedy
